reviews.text: 0,5L can. Good beige head and nice dark amber color. Very pleasant aroma, light, sweet and rich taste. I like it!
Deep golden colorSweet aroma of malt, corn, with notes of hopsTaste is well balanced^ malt and hops. Good beer
Aroma: mix of hops, from pine to citrus. Intresting and intensiveTaste: malt as a main component enhanced by tender hoppy notes Good brew
